oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #031
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #31, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers, Roy Wiggins, Texas Ruby and host Jud Collins. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Willis Brothers; Tennessee Plowboys; Roy Wiggins; Texas Ruby
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Jud Collins) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- There's A New Day Tomorrow (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Eddy Arnold talks -- What's Gonna Happen To Me (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold introduces Texas Ruby -- Texas Ruby talks -- Rock My Cradle Once Again (Texas Ruby) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- I'm Lookin' For Someone To Love (Roy Wiggins steel guitar) -- Jud Collins talks -- What A Fool I Was To Ever Let You Go (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Collins, Jud; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Wiggins, Roy; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Texas Ruby, 1908-1963;
